Name: VEGAS 19 Edit - Steam Edition
About the game: Record multiple video and audio sources and bring them directly into the timeline. Correct your webcam shots for accurate color, or grade captured footage to create the perfect mood. Add effects and text to any scene and create your own personal intro animation. Process your voice over for crystal clear sound or create sound effects with the perfect audio workflow. When you’re ready upload your video directly to social media or export your project using customizable render templates. Highlights Essential functions in VEGAS Edit 19 – Steam Edition: Comprehensive screen capturing tool Latest effects, filters, transitions & titles Direct upload to YouTube & Vimeo Audio synchronization for multicam editing Green screen removal GPU acceleration for decoding/encoding for Nvidia®, AMD® and Intel® Multi-region motion tracking Adjustment tracks Professional format support HDR color correction and grading
